block.p: Lauren Joyce Simmons, the daughter of Sandra Simmons and Dr. Howard Simmons of Dix Hills, N.Y., was married yesterday evening to Craig Daryl Feldman, the son of Karen Feldman and Dr. Donald Feldman of Lynnfield, Mass. Rabbi Robert Widom officiated at Temple Emanuel in Kings Point, N.Y.

Mrs. Feldman, 25, is an associate in the executive compensation and employee benefits department at Fried Frank Harris Shriver & Jacobson, the New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania and received a law degree from Harvard. Her father, a dentist, practices in Franklin Square, N.Y. Her mother teaches French at Wyandanch High School in Wyandanch, N.Y.

Lauren Joyce Simmons, the daughter of Sandra Simmons and Dr. Howard Simmons of Dix Hills, N.Y., was married yesterday evening to Craig Daryl Feldman, the son of Karen Feldman and Dr. Donald Feldman of Lynnfield, Mass. Rabbi Robert Widom officiated at Temple Emanuel in Kings Point, N.Y.

Mrs. Feldman, 25, is an associate in the executive compensation and employee benefits department at Fried Frank Harris Shriver & Jacobson, the New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania and received a law degree from Harvard. Her father, a dentist, practices in Franklin Square, N.Y. Her mother teaches French at Wyandanch High School in Wyandanch, N.Y.

Dr. Feldman, 30, graduated with bachelor's and dental degrees from Tufts University. He also received a certificate in orthodontics from Boston University. His father is an orthodontist in Lynn, Mass., and his mother is the office manager for the practice.
